title: Into the Dark: Down - One Minute Review!
author: Think Story
comment: Thought I'd try these one minute reviews for movies that don't quite warrant an ending explained but also aren't bad enough for a takedown video. Let me know what you think!
The woman was just ASKING to die! Like 4 different times where she could have gotten out safely!

One thing worth considering when you make a trapped-in-an-elevator movie: You can't run out of story at the 42-minute mark and expect us to sit through another 45 minutes until the resolution. 
The sad thing is that this is the fourth Blumhouse flick in this series that I've seen, and it's the best so far.

honestly I thought the first half was excellent character development and I seriously was rooting for (and cared about) both of the characters. In one of the early scenes there's a noise outside, indicating another (possibly hostile) creature's existence, and I was hoping something would come from that... unfortunately the second half just went downhill

I honestly shouldn't have liked this movie so much, but I did! 
😂😂 It was actually a good time!
description:
Reviewing Into the Dark's Episode 5 "Down" in one minute!
